createTableQuery: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS telegramBot (userChatid INT NOT NULL,mainMessage INT NOT NULL, replyMessageId INT NOT NULL, adminChatIds INT [] NOT NULL, adminMessageIds INT [] NOT NULL)
saveMessageIdsQuery: INSERT INTO telegramBot(userChatid, mainMessage, replyMessageId, adminChatIds, adminMessageIds) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5)
findMessageIdByUserQuery: DELETE FROM telegramBot WHERE userChatid = $1 AND replyMessageId = $2 RETURNING *
findMessageIdByAdminQuery: DELETE FROM telegramBot WHERE $1 = ANY(adminChatIds) AND $2 = ANY(adminMessageIds) RETURNING *
